# FamilyControlsMember

**Enumeration**

The type of account that Family Controls is currently managing.

## Declaration

```swift
@objc enum FamilyControlsMember
```

## Enumeration Cases

- **FamilyControlsMember.child**: A value indicating that Family Controls is managing a child account, so that a parent or guardian must enter their authorization credentials.
- **FamilyControlsMember.individual**: A value indicating that Family Controls is managing an individual account, so that the user can enter their authorization credentials.

## Instance Properties

- **description**: A nonlocalized description of the type of account, suitable for debugging.

## Conforms To

- Copyable
- CustomStringConvertible
- Decodable
- Encodable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
